name: WWW Bandwidth Monitor for Apache
short_description: Need to know how much bandwidth you have remaining this month? Then this is the script for you! (note: this script has only been tested on cpanel systems; if you use cpanel then this should work; otherwise drop us a line and we'll do the best we can)
